Package classifier

The package conatins the framework necessary for building a classifier out of the training data.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BayesClassifier
    The BayesClassifier class extends the Classifiers class Classifiers A BayesClassifier object has a strucutre of nodes (graph) that is used to elaborate a list of predictions.
    Classifiers
    The Classifiers class has the purpose of serving has a blueprint for a classifier.
    connection
    The connection class has the purpose of saving information about the connections in the graph.
    graph
    The graph class has the purpose of creating a graph to be used by the classifier.
    NodeC
    The NodeC class represents the only node different from the others in the graph (node C).

Package classifier Description

The package conatins the framework necessary for building a classifier out of the training data. The classifier also contains the method Classifiers.predict(data.InputHandler) which allows the user to test the classifier.
